caption.p: Affect of acclimation temperature on weight‐corrected standard metabolic rates of North American salamanders. Species grouped into (a) wide and (b) narrow‐ranging based on latitudinal extent > or <5° (16 species: seven wide and nine narrow‐ranging). MCMCglmm to test for differences in VO 2 between acclimation temperatures for each test temperature. Means are plotted ± 95% confidence limits. Significance of difference between 14 and 22°C is given above each test temperature: ● = p ≤ .1, * = p < .05, ** = p < .01; no symbol = p > .1
